DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Develop test pain assessment management system people cancer ( PAMS-PC ) . - Obtain feedback patient non-hematologic malignancy propose feature system usability effectiveness . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . The study contain 3 part . Patients part II assign 1 2 assessment group . - Part I : Patients participate focus interview telephone approximately 45 minute . The interview include discussion belief concern regard pain management , strategy use patient manage pain , feature propose pain assessment management system people cancer ( PAMS-PC ) , reaction patient propose component system . - Part II : - Group A : Patients participate assessment session approximately 90 minute , comprise completion questionnaire follow use test version PAMS-PC . - Group B : Patients use PAMS-PC first follow completion questionnaire . Thirty patient randomly select 2 group repeat use PAMS-PC 3 hour initial assessment . - Part III : Patients participate patient acceptance test 30-60 minute , patient test demo version system , complete evaluation questionnaire , provide feedback telephone . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 180 patient ( 10 part I , 150 ( 75 per group ) part II , 20 part III ) accrue study .
